name: The Glaswegian Connection
description:
Special mounted print of "The Glaswegian Connection" from the range of New York Scottish art designed for Tribeca Cafe, Glasgow. This one is of the Statue of Liberty, holding her favourite drink, Irn Bru, with a cone on her head as a tribute to "The Glasgow Hat", the Duke of Wellington statue in Royal Exchange Square, Glasgow which always has a cone added. The title is a take on "The French Connection" movie as the Tribeca district is famous for its yearly film festival, plus the Statue itself was a gift from the french.

Mounted - Fuji Film photographic lustre print with double white mount and mdf back for stability. Signed and titled on mount. Image size 29cm x 29cm . Total size 50cm x 50cm. Wrapped in cellophane for protection. Great as a gift. Ready to be taken to your local framers. Can also be framed on request.

name: Glasgow Tenements Art - Limited Edition
description:
Striking, slightly surreal, and very contemporary depiction of a classic Glasgow tenement building. Includes details such as an old glasgow bus, the Waverley, Mackintosh stained glass, the Glasgow crest (split up) , Lobey Dosser, and many more.

Medium - Digital mixed media - 3d modelling, digital painting and photography.

Limited edition (100) hand embellished print. Hand embellished on areas which would have been painted or drawn in real life. i.e chalk on the hopscotch on the pavement, charcoal on the noughts and crosses game on the wall to the left of the door, and red glossy paint on the door.

Paper - Printed on Hahnemühle studio museum fine art paper by giclee UK Edinburgh. Numbered and signed on print. 70cm x 70cm

Framing- Classic gold or classic silver with a light cream slip. Glass. approx 90cm x 90cm total size. Other styles on request.

Small Mounted Print- Small Open edition print with double white mount and mdf back for stability. Image size 25cm x 25cm . Total size 40cm x 40cm. Wrapped in cellophane. Signed and titled. for protection

NEW Medium open edition print. 50cm x 50cm Unmounted. Rolled in a tube. Lustre photo paper.

CONTACT with any questions, or for other sizes and alternative framing. If you want a specific limited edition number please mention it in the notes section of the Paypal order.

BESPOKE building art - if you would like a specific building created in this style get in touch for a quote.

£5 UK delivery. Special Courier.
